name: Zero Gravity (itch) (jdong6)
description:
"Have you ever seen that movie Gravity?"

You are stranded on a destroyed space station. To survive, you'll need to make it to the escape pod. Here's the catch: you're tethered to a (very talkative) astronaut - you'll have to work with them to get home safely. Manage both astronauts and the tether connecting them to escape!

(It's pretty much a game version of that one scene from Gravity)

Works with a gamepad only (Xbox 360)

Controls:

  • Left Stick: Control the yellow astronaut (that's you!)
  • Right Stick: Control the purple astronaut
  • (Hold) LB: Make the tether shorter.
  • (Hold) RB: Make the tether longer.
  • A: Dialogue control

It's possible to play with two players, if you share a controller :)

Cool tips:

  • The yellow astronaut has more control force than the purple astronaut.
  • Your speed is faster the closer you are together, but you're also more likely to spin. Increasing the tether length has the opposite effect.
